MemoryInfobox.description: 'An athlete inspired by Kassandra at the Olympic Games|Olympics wished to devote herself to Zeus. The athlete wanted to destroy her shrine to Poseidon but was afraid of beasts in the area.'

General_Description: '''Wasted Devotion''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Settlng an example, Kassandra was faced with the consequences.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire ''Anything you need a [[mercenary]]'s help with?''
*'''Athlete:''' ''You! Beloved child of [[Zeus]] and [[Hera]]! You are officially the greatest being who ever lived.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What equipment? Most of the athletes I've seen barely wear clothes.''
*'''Athlete:''' ''The javelins,'' misthios''. Stop thinking about naked athletes and help us with these thieves!''
<tabber>
|-|I am the greatest.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''
*'''Athlete:''' ''
|-|I am the greatest... for now.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I have achieved what no mere mortal can achieve... until another mere mortal achieves it.''
*'''Athlete:''' ''Nonsense.''
</tabber>
*'''Athlete:''' '' Once a mighty warrior, always a mighty warrior. You have given me great inspiration,'' misthios.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''How so?''
*'''Athlete:''' ''By winning the [[Olympic Games|Olympics]], you've made me realize how much time I've wasted worshipping [[Poseidon]] when I should have been devoted to Zeus.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So what now?''
*'''Athlete:''' ''Before your heroics, I foolishly devoted a shrine to Poseidon. Now, I'd like to see it turned to dust, but wild beasts are drawn to the sacrifices I left there.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Sounds like you want me to kill the beasts.''
*'''Athlete:''' ''Yes, all of them must be gutted. Do you accept?''
(Accept - I'll kill the beasts.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you. You have my word.''
*'''Athlete:''' ''Good, get this done quickly.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Leave it to me.''
Kassandra left the athlete, and sought out the shrine wherein she found and slew two [[bear]]s before returning to the athlete.
*'''Athlete:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.''
*'''Athlete:''' ''You do good work, friend. Here, this is for you.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Happy to help.''
The athlete rewarded Kassandra for her help.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped an athlete with their problem, and was rewarded with [[drachma]]e.
Section_Trivia: *This quest is triggered by completing the Olympic questline. It is unknown if there are variables that affect the availability.
